5.5. The Promotion Fees shall be paid to DD by MBRK fifteen (15) days after the receipt of an invoice from DD by  MBRK.

perturbation.original_text:
18. Termination and Fees

This Agreement may be terminated as follows:

(a) Either party hereto shall have the right to terminate this Agreement after thirty (30) days written notice to the other in  the event the other is in breach of this Agreement unless the breaching party cures the breach before the expiration of  such period of time. Each such notice shall set forth in reasonable detail the specifics of the breach.
perturbation.changed_text:
18. Termination and Fees

This Agreement may be terminated as follows:

(a) Either party hereto shall have the right to terminate this Agreement after thirty (30) days written notice to the other in  the event the other is in breach of this Agreement unless the breaching party cures the breach before the expiration of  such period of time. Each such notice shall set forth in reasonable detail the specifics of the breach.

(g) MBRK may terminate this agreement immediately upon written notice if DD fails to meet performance metrics outlined in EXHIBIT 5.
perturbation.explanation: Section 18(a) requires a 30-day notice period for termination due to breach, allowing the breaching party time to cure the breach. However, the added section 18(g) allows MBRK to terminate the agreement immediately for failure to meet performance metrics, without any cure period. This creates an inconsistency in the termination process, specifically regarding the notice period and opportunity to cure, leading to potential disputes.
